description: The goal is to bring the developer community closer together, discussing all kinds of topics related to development, career, tools, and more.
Contributing to Node.js documentation translation efforts, making the technology more accessible to non-English speaking developers.
Contributing to the translation of ElectronJS documentation, helping to make the framework more accessible to developers worldwide.

role: Event Organizer - On The Road Belém
description: Organized the BrazilJS On The Road event in Belém, bringing together the JavaScript community for knowledge sharing and networking.
Part of the internationalization team, working to make Node.js documentation and resources available in multiple languages.

Responsible for developing and maintaining various Telegram bots with different purposes, such as content searches (Spotify, Youtube, Google, etc.), group management, and Chatbot functionality.
